alert.note: Alert for Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 9:49PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Zapata County through 1015 PM CDT... At 948 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zapata High School, or near Zapata, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zapata, Bustamante, Zapata High School, Falcon Lake Estates, Siesta Shores, Falcon Shores, Zapata County Public Library, Falcon Mesa, Black Bass and Zapata--Medina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
